title: Line 16 (defunct)
text: Line 16 was a former metro line that was planned for construction between 2010~2020; the line starts from <a href="Hongkou%20Football%20Stadium%20%28Shanghai%20Metro%29">Hongkou Football Stadium</a>, <a href="Hongkou%20District">Hongkou District</a>, via <a href="Shanghai%20Circus%20World">Shanghai Circus World</a>, <a href="Shanghai%20West%20Railway%20Station">Shanghai West Railway Station</a>, <a href="Shanghai%20Zoo">Shanghai Zoo</a>, <a href="Lianhua%20Road%20%28Shanghai%20Metro%29">Lianhua Road</a>, <a href="Meilong%20Town">Meilong Town</a> to <a href="Wujing%20Town">Wujing Town</a>, and <a href="Minhang%20District">Minhang District</a>. The line can change to lines <a href="Line%201%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">1</a>, <a href="Line%202%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">2</a>, <a href="Line%203%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">3</a>, <a href="Line%207%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">7</a>, <a href="Line%208%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">8</a>, <a href="Line%209%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">9</a>, <a href="Line%2010%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">10</a>, <a href="Line%2011%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">11</a>, <a href="Line%2012%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">12</a>, <a href="Line%2013%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">13</a>, <a href="Line%2014%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">14</a> and <a href="Line%2015%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">15</a>. As the "Line 16" designation has been usurped by a <a href="Line%2016%2C%20Shanghai%20Metro">new line</a> (which at the time was called route 21), its current status is unknown.
